entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Inukjuak
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:18 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -27.8°C

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 30.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning early this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming east 20 late this evening. Temperature steady near minus 30. Wind chill minus 44 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 30. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing near noon. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 near noon. Temperature steady near minus 30. Wind chill near minus 44. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 44 in the evening and minus 52 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023
